Description: A race in tune with both nature and magic, the elves highly praise intelligence and knowledge, as well as 'refined' arts of combat.

Creation.Stat Restrictions: Your Dexterity must be at least 1.

Weapons: You are trained in Longbows and Longswords.

~The Blade Dance~.Effect: When you land the killing strike on a Worthy Enemy, you reset your movement this turn and don't provoke attacks of oportunity this turn.

~Meditation~.Effect:
Instead of sleeping for 8 hours, you can meditate for 4 hours and achieve the same result.
While meditating, all checks you perform are done at -5.

~Arcane Veins~.Effect: You permanently know 1 Advanced Spell from the Arcane or Nature spell lists.

~Darkvision~.Effect: You can see up to 15 meters away in darkness, without discerning colors.
